nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:player_head","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Minos Champion (Mythological Creature)\",\"color\":\"red\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"The Minos Champion is one of the rare mobs\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"in the Mythological Ritual, and can only be\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"found by using a epic or legendary Griffin Pet.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"It gains roughly 3 to 4% of a damage buff for each second\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"it's lived for, capping at 600%, which is when it despawns.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"While alive, it can attack using a sword or a bow, if\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"the Champion is unable to reach a player, it will spawn\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"a lighting strike on the player once, similary\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"to the Gaia Construct.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"❤ Health\",\"color\":\"red\"},{\"text\":\":\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"[\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"},{\"text\":\"Griffin\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"},{\"text\":\"] \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"},{\"text\":\"2,000,000 ❤\",\"color\":\"red\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"[\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"},{\"text\":\"Griffin\",\"color\":\"gold\"},{\"text\":\"] \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"},{\"text\":\"12,000,000 ❤\",\"color\":\"red\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"EPIC\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"MINOS_CHAMPION_MONSTER"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{}}}
lore: {"text":"The Minos Champion is one of the rare mobs","color":"gray"}
{"text":"in the Mythological Ritual, and can only be","color":"gray"}
{"text":"found by using a epic or legendary Griffin Pet.","color":"gray"}
{"text":"It gains roughly 3 to 4% of a damage buff for each second","color":"gray"}
{"text":"it's lived for, capping at 600%, which is when it despawns.","color":"gray"}
{"text":"While alive, it can attack using a sword or a bow, if","color":"gray"}
{"text":"the Champion is unable to reach a player, it will spawn","color":"gray"}
{"text":"a lighting strike on the player once, similary","color":"gray"}
